medium: Synthetic fibers, beads, sequins, metal, pearls
title: Flag
description: pink and black beaded border around central bottle, candle and sword design; black letters \'Edgar\' at lower right of center design: multicolored bottle, star, candle and sword surrounded by metallic silver discs; dark purple border around all edges; pink pearl row between design area and solid purple border; above bottle design letters \' Aug Oubat Agre\'
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
